name: BCP_vg
brief: Variable Generator process for BCP Branch-Cut-Price (pricing)

algorithms.name:
Variable Generator: Column Generation via Pricing Subproblems

The Variable Generator (VG) performs column generation:
generates variables with negative reduced cost from dual solutions.

**Column generation workflow:**
1. LP process packs dual solution (cut duals, reduced costs)
2. VG solves pricing subproblem to find negative reduced cost columns
3. VG sends new variables back to LP for addition

**BCP_vg_prob members:**
- cuts, pi: Cuts and their dual values from LP
- sender: Process ID of requesting LP
- phase, node_level, node_index, node_iteration: Context info
- upper_bound: Current best known solution
- core: Problem core description

**User customization:**
Override BCP_vg_user methods to implement pricing:
- unpack_dual_solution(): Unpack dual values
- generate_vars(): Main pricing subproblem logic
- pack_var(): Send variables back to LP

**Relation to LP process:**
When LP becomes primal infeasible during column generation,
it sends duals to VG. New columns restore feasibility.

see: BCP_lp.hpp for LP process that requests columns
